newsitem.title: USA: Brown Group June same store sales fall.
newsitem.headline: Brown Group June same store sales fall.

text.p: Brown Group Inc said Thursday that same store sales in June at its Famous Footwear retail division fell 0.5 percent from the comparable period last year.
Same store sales for the five weeks to July 5, 1997 at its Naturalizer retail division were off 1.2 percent from the comparable period last year, the retailer said.
Total sales in June at Famous Footwear's 805 stores rose 5.3 percent from last year to $79.1 million. Total sales at Naturalizer's 348 stores were off 1.3 percent to $13.7 million.
For the 22-week period to July 5, 1997, same store sales at Famous Footwear rose 2.2 percent. Total sales rose 7.4 percent to $340.1 million.
For the 22-week period to July 5, 1997, same store sales at Naturalizer declined 4.6 percent. Total sales were off 4.1 percent to $56.7 million.
